DOC.brief_title: Study Atomoxetine Children With ADHD Assess Symptomatic Functional Outcomes
DOC.criteria: Patients must ADHD , outpatient , least 6 year age 11 year 8 month age Visit 1 test complete child reach age 12 . Patients must moderately severe symptom ADHD . Patients must able swallow study drug capsule . Patients must Bipolar disorder , psychosis , autism , Asperger 's syndrome , pervasive developmental disorder , seizure disorder . Patients must take atomoxetine prior start study .
